extendedInfo.description: Do you think you have the reflexes to play Llama Or Duck?! You have a split second to decide whether you're looking at a llama...or a duck! See how far you can get before your fingers burn out! Features: - Beautiful pictures of beautiful creatures. - Hours upon hours of gameplay (if you're really, really, really good) - Save your high score and show all your friends that YOU, and ONLY YOU, possess the power of the innate llama warrior.

reviews.title: Fun game, but can be improved
reviews.comment: I could play this game for hours on the iPhone, but in this game for the Android the buttons are too small. If they were bigger It would for sure be 5 stars.
reviews.author: Kylie Calderon

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: I remember watching The Llama Song as a kid and this brings back memories!! Just make the buttons a little bigger. They seem too small. 5 out of 5 llamas would agree and 5 out of 5 ducks would too if they could type and talk. What are reading this for get it!!!!
reviews.author: Adam Kobosky

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: I would like it if the buttons were as big as the ones I phones have.  The buttons I have are half the size of theirs yet my phone is almost twice as big doesn\'t make much sense to me please make the buttons bigger
reviews.author: Fernando Ramirez

reviews.title: Would like if...
reviews.comment: My sister and brother play this. Its a very cute game and I would love to play it, if only it would let me open the app up.
reviews.author: Heather S

reviews.title: Meh...
reviews.comment: Well, I think that this has not that good responding. I saw a picture of a llama, and I clicked llama. Then again, another popped up so I clicked llama, and I failed. So... Its not working well. Plus, those ads that just pop up after you lose a game are really annoying.
reviews.author: Ethan Bollinger

reviews.title: Utter Feces
reviews.comment: I guess one could consider this \"fun\" if you were an A.D.D. simpleton.  And ads that pop up and wont let you back out of immediately are unacceptable.  RAGE QUIT! and uninstall.
reviews.author: Jeryko Seven

reviews.title: Addicting
reviews.comment: I\'ve been smoking for 35 years a the addiction of nicotine doesn\'t even compare to this game. Literally it\'s so stressful my doctor said I\'m developing an aneurysm
reviews.author: Corbin Rowe

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: I don\'t know why but this is like the best game ever. It\'s kinda hard but it\'s addicting
reviews.author: Cassie Moore

reviews.title: Awesome Sauce
reviews.comment: Complex game story.  Absolutely riveting. Can\'t wait for Llama Duck 2! Any word on a release date!?
reviews.author: Matt Howard

reviews.title: VERY entertaining
reviews.comment: app, but after a couple games an ad will pop up and I have to re open the app to play it again. if it didn\'t crash this app would be da (the) bomb
reviews.author: Erik Senekham

reviews.title: Entertaining
reviews.comment: But improve the UI. The buttons are tiny and way in the corners and there\'s no exit button?
reviews.author: Brian Lang

reviews.title: Awful!
reviews.comment: Adds are overpouring and far too frequent.  Plus the buttons dont work.  Fun but needs work.
reviews.author: Matthew Nord

reviews.title: Ugh disappointed!!
reviews.comment: Buttons need to be way bigger!!! They are too tiny especially on the Samsung note it\'s awful!
reviews.author: Jazzlyn Martinez

reviews.title: Hard!!!!
reviews.comment: I have an android and the buttons are so small !!! This game doesn\'t even allow me to have enough time to start a game and push the buttons. It goes a bit too quick. Plz slow it down for the first pic. And u should have settings so little kids can play too and old people who cant see very well should have the option of bold print buttons. For little kids i suggest a minuet for each slide cuz they dont have fast reflexes. Please consider this
reviews.author: Katie Weber

reviews.title: Dumb
reviews.comment: Dumbest game ever you only have 1 second to get it right I can\'t remember where duck or llama is dumb
reviews.author: Janice Weaver

reviews.title: Lacking
reviews.comment: Very fun!...for iphone/ipod touch. On the S3 the buttons are WAY too small and the ads pop up every chance they get. Recommended for people with a higher tolerance for ads and small fingers. All in all, it\'s a Good time killer.
reviews.author: Madison Lilly

reviews.title: Dear You
reviews.comment: This game is awesome and the ads have been removed so dont worry! Its stupid but also really fun. Download download download!! (:
reviews.author: Ellen Fountain

reviews.title: So addicting!
reviews.comment: This game just keeps you playing! I love trying to beat my friends scores :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: For now, my high score is 62. I\'m trying to beat my friend\'s high score which is 89. 62 \"For now\"
reviews.author: Muyideen Ogunbunmi

reviews.title: AMAZINGLY THE BEST GAME EVER
reviews.comment: Good but...... WARNING: YOU MUST BE FAST
reviews.author: Tonya Aitken
